title: Fontographer strips dashes in font style names
content: Help! Fontographer is driving me crazy because it keeps striping the dash between the typeface name and the style name on any font I modify that had the dash there originally. This is a huge problem because we need the fonts for Adobe Distiller which has to see the same font name as the input source to properly do font substitution.
author: moonwolf

comments.content:
In the font info window, try typing the entire name with the dash in the main name window.
